body:
This change makes Qt tools always bootstrapped.

This PR is an alternative to #19785.

Fixes partially #14648.
Fixes #18536. On ODROID-HC1 + Armbian 21.02.2 Focal:
```
$ make -C depends qt_configured
...
Configure summary:

Build type: linux-g++ (arm, CPU features: <none>)
Compiler: gcc 9.3.0
Configuration: enable_new_dtags largefile precompile_header silent release c++11 c++14 c++1z dbus reduce_exports static stl
Build options:
  Mode ................................... release
  Optimize release build for size ........ no
  Building shared libraries .............. no
  Using C standard ....................... C11
  Using C++ standard ..................... C++1z
  Using ccache ........................... no
  Using gold linker ...................... no
  Using new DTAGS ........................ yes
  Using precompiled headers .............. yes
  Using LTCG ............................. no
  Target compiler supports:
    NEON ................................. no
  Build parts ............................ libs
Qt modules and options:
...
```


Related to #21588.

#### Guix builds:
_...coming..._

#### Gitian builds:
_...coming..._
title: build, qt: Do not require xml module for native builds in depends
